txt.en: 'Contested areas are locations within the Ettenmoors that can be captured by either Angmar or the Free Peoples. There are five contested areas within the Ettenmoors: <rgb=#FF00FF00>Lugazag, Tol Ascarnen, Tirith Rhaw, Grimwood Lumber Camp, and Isendeep Mines</rgb>. Taking control of an area will cause friendly defenders to spawn.\n\nYou can find quests and information on the current state of the contested areas inside the War Tent in Gramsfoot.'
